name: Asteroid Bank
description:
You might not have guns, but you have a strong enough shield to use that as a weapon. Just be careful to not get caught out while it's recharging.

There's no win state in this prototype, but see how many stars you can collect before your health runs out.

Controls: While your shield is green, click and drag with the mouse to aim, release to launch. You will do damage to enemies while your shield is yellow.

Click here to try the HTML version

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020

Made with the Kenny Game Assets
